article_title: 100 grueling miles: For Omaha’s Angie Hodge, there is joy in Leadville ultramarathon
article_text:
Six hundred ninety runners started the Leadville 100 and 360 of them finished. UNO math professor Angie Hodge, right, finished 348th overall and 51st among women.

Related Links Related: PDF: Leadville Trail Map

Posted: Saturday, August 23, 2014 1:00 am

Posted in Sports, Local-sports on Saturday, August 23, 2014 1:00 am.

og.description: One year ago, on a bit of a whim, Angie Hodge signed up for the “Race Across The Sky” and made it to mile 77 before falling behind the 30-hour pace. Since then, Hodge had devoted her life to this event.
